instruction: What is the meaning of the proverb 'Slow and steady wins the race'?
output: The proverb "Slow and steady wins the race" is an encouragement to persevere with patience and dedication, even when progress is slow. This can apply to all aspects of life, and suggests that while a slow and steady approach may take longer to achieve success, it will ultimately be more rewarding than impulsive and rushed decision-making.
